title: How to recover pictures from an SD card - Quora

response.answer_text: Were the photos initially stored in the phone's microSD card? If so, you can take the card out, insert it in your computer and run a photo recovery program on it. Installing and run a Photo Recovery app on your Mac/Win. Choose Photo Recovery from the recovery types.Click on "Photo" on the main interface. Connect your memory card with Mac, then select the memory device recovery. With "Only scan deleted files" checked, only the lost photo files will be checked.After hitting on the "Next" button in the previous step, you will get into the photo file scanning section. The app will check files for you intensively. You can have a preview on these photo files during scanning.Recover Data from Memory Card on Mac with EaseRecover Deleted or Formatted Files for Hard Driv Easlily

Not only pictures but you can recover all kinds of files from an SD card. The procedure is quite simple that will be explained in the below video for you. The video will tell you can you can recover data from your SD card using the most popular card data recovery in 2019 i.e. RecoverIT. The procedure is for Windows as well as Mac system. You can restore your deleted pictures and other files from a corrupted and formatted SD card very easily. Watch the video now.
